name: Squeakers (itch) (Brightfield Studios)
description:
This was the Brightfield submission to the 2019 GMTK Game Jam.

The theme was Escape.

Our hero Squeakers has lived all his life in a laboratory cage. He and his friends have been experimented on with various physical and chemical factors. Now squeakers has had enough and has decieded to escape this plasticglass hell hole with his girlfriend Mousette. Avoid the traps and mind controlled rats and get to Mousette so you can escape together. Perhaps some of the mouse altering drugs can be of some help?

Objective: Get to your girlfriend Mousette! 

Controls:
Use WASD to move.

Interact with items to get an edge.
